title: Dangers of 5G Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/14/19
itunes:title: Dangers of 5G Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/14/19
description:
George Noory and author Ann Louise Gittleman explore her research into the new wave of 5G cellular technology, and whether electromagnetic fields from the devices may pose health risks to humans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
